featured.text: Most people would think that aside from comets and stars there is little else out there.

definition.zh_def: 彗星是一種由冰、塵埃和氣體組成的天體，當它接近太陽時會形成明亮的尾巴。
definition.en_def: A comet is a celestial body made of ice, dust, and gas that develops a bright tail when it approaches the sun.
definition.example: The comet was visible in the night sky for several weeks.
